item.title: Git Branching Strategies
item.description: In a previous post, I talked about git workflows and I outlined the two big problems I see with git workflows: Pull Requests/Reviews Branching Strategies I took the easy route at the time and just talked about Pull Requests/Reviews. But I was requested to throw some thoughts out around branching strategies and how they should work. The reason I think branching strategies are such a complicated topic is because it touches more than just git.
